h2.b: Welcome to the POV Progress Dashboard...

div.p: Welcome $env:user_realname$ ! This dashboard is meant to provide you guidance and feedback on the progress of your Proof of Value experience. You should review this dashboard regularly to see how things are progressing.

a.data-token-json: {"show_app_charts": null, "show_pageviews_charts": null, "show_user_charts": null, "show_user_creation_charts": null, "show_search_charts": null, "show_kpis": null, "show_docs": null}

html.p: Click on one of the links above to select which visualization to show.

search.query: | inputlookup setup_lookup | mvexpand DataSources | makemv DataSources delim="," allowempty=t | eval DataSource1 = mvindex(DataSources, 0) | eval DataSource2 = mvindex(DataSources, 1) | eval DataSource3 = mvindex(DataSources, 2) | eval DataSource4 = mvindex(DataSources, 3) | eval DataSource5 = mvindex(DataSources, 4) | mvexpand UseCases | makemv UseCases delim="," allowempty=t | eval UseCase1 = mvindex(UseCases, 0) | eval UseCase2 = mvindex(UseCases, 1) | eval UseCase3 = mvindex(UseCases, 2) | lookup autobahn_lanes AutobahnPOVType as AutobahnLane, UseCases as UseCase1 OUTPUT FriendlyName as FriendlyName1, URL as UseCaseURL1 | lookup autobahn_lanes AutobahnPOVType as AutobahnLane, UseCases as UseCase2 OUTPUT FriendlyName as FriendlyName2, URL as UseCaseURL2 | lookup autobahn_lanes AutobahnPOVType as AutobahnLane, UseCases as UseCase3 OUTPUT FriendlyName as FriendlyName3, URL as UseCaseURL3

li.a: Splunkbase - Jumpstart your progress with free apps that provide out of the box dashboards, reports, alerts and searches.
Splunk Community - Interact with other Splunkers and find answers to your Splunk questions!
Go Splunk - Searches built by other Splunkers (GoSplunk is not affiliated with Splunk).

tr.b: Here is a listing of the KPIs that are measured on this dashboard and why they are important.

tr.td: The number of apps installed in Splunk Cloud. This tracks if the POV has pre-built content to help deliver the use cases selected. 1 or more are needed to get this KPI to turn green.

The total number of unique user logins to Splunk Cloud. A unique user login to Splunk Cloud shows that work is being actively done across the team. 3 or more user logins are needed to get this KPI to turn green.
The total number of pageviews in Splunk Cloud. This is a measure of how often the team is interacting with Splunk. 15 or more pageviews are needed to get this KPI to turn green.
The total number of ad-hoc searches in Splunk Cloud. This is a measure of how much the team is searching inside Splunk. 25 or more searches are needed to get this KPI to turn green.
The total number new users created in Splunk Cloud. This is a measure of onboarding new users to Splunk. 3 or more user creations are needed to get this KPI to turn green.

tr.th: Use Case Delivery - Links to dashboards, reports or alerts showing the desired use cases

search.query: index=summary source="splunk-apps-manifest" | dedup app node_type sortby - _time | eval "Node Type"=case(node_type="idx", "Indexer", node_type="indexer", "Indexer", node_type="sh", "Search Head", node_type="search_head", "Search Head", node_type="shc", "Search Head", node_type="idm", "Inputs Data Manager", node_type="inputs_data_manager", "Inputs Data Manager", node_type="c0m", "Cluster Master") | mvcombine delim=", " "Node Type" | rename app as App, customer_current_app_version as "Current Installed App Version" | table App "Node Type" "Current Installed App Version" | sort App | stats count(App) as "Number of Apps installed"

index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=idm*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*) (user!="splunk-system-user" AND user!=cmon_user AND user!=admin AND user!=internal_*) action=success OR (action="*login*" info=succeeded) | stats distinct_count(user) as "User Login Count"

(file!="*.*" user!=cmon_user user!=internal_monitoring index=_internal method=GET sourcetype=splunk_web_access status=200 uri_path="/*/app/*" (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*)) | rex field=uri_path "\/app\/(?<App>[^\/]+).*" | rename file as Page, user as User | stats count as Pageviews | sort - "Pageviews"

(host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*) NOT user=cmon_user NOT user=internal_monitoring NOT user=ops_admin index=_audit action=search sourcetype=audittrail search_id!="rsa_*" | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | eval search_type = case( match(search_id, "^SummaryDirector_"), "summarization", match(savedsearch_name, "^_ACCELERATE_"), "acceleration", match(search_id, "^((rt_)?scheduler_|alertsmanager_)"), "scheduled", match(search_id, "\d{10}\.\d+(_[0-9A-F]{8}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{12})?$"), "ad hoc", true(), "other") | eval search=if(isnull(savedsearch_name) OR savedsearch_name=="", search, savedsearch_name) | stats min(_time) as _time, values(user) as user, values(_time) as time, values(info) as info, max(total_run_time) as total_run_time, first(search) as search, first(search_type) as search_type, first(apiStartTime) as apiStartTime, first(apiEndTime) as apiEndTime by search_id, host | where isnotnull(search) AND search_type="ad hoc" | search host=* (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*) | mvexpand info | search info=completed OR info=failed | bin span=10m _time | fields _time user host search_type | fillnull value=N/A _time | search _time!= N/A | stats count
index=_audit (create_user info=succeeded) OR (action=create_user info=succeeded) | stats count as "New Users Created"

index=summary source="splunk-apps-manifest" | dedup app node_type sortby - _time | eval "Node Type"=case(node_type="idx", "Indexer", node_type="indexer", "Indexer", node_type="sh", "Search Head", node_type="search_head", "Search Head", node_type="shc", "Search Head", node_type="idm", "Inputs Data Manager", node_type="inputs_data_manager", "Inputs Data Manager", node_type="c0m", "Cluster Master") | mvcombine delim=", " "Node Type" | rename app as App, customer_current_app_version as "Current Installed App Version" | table App "Node Type" "Current Installed App Version" | sort App

(file!="*.*" user!=cmon_user user!=internal_monitoring user!=admin index=_internal method=GET sourcetype=splunk_web_access status=200 uri_path="/*/app/*" (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*)) | rex field=uri_path "\/app\/(?<App>[^\/]+).*" | timechart count as "Pageviews" by "App"

(file!="*.*" user!=cmon_user user!=internal_monitoring user!=admin index=_internal method=GET sourcetype=splunk_web_access status=200 uri_path="/*/app/*" (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*)) | rex field=uri_path "\/app\/(?<App>[^\/]+).*" | rename file as Page, user as User | stats count as Pageviews by User App Page | stats sum(Pageviews) as "Pageviews" by "App" | head 10 | sort - "Pageviews"

(file!="*.*" user!=cmon_user user!=internal_monitoring user!=admin index=_internal method=GET sourcetype=splunk_web_access status=200 uri_path="/*/app/*" (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*)) | rex field=uri_path "\/app\/(?<App>[^\/]+).*" | rename file as Page, user as User | stats count as Pageviews by User App Page | stats sum(Pageviews) as "Pageviews" by App User | sort - "Pageviews"

index=_internal sourcetype="splunk_web_access" method="GET" status="200" user!=- user!=admin user!=internal_monitoring | rex field=uri ".*\/app\/(?<app>[^\/]*)\/" | stats count by app, user | stats list(app) as "application" by user

(file!="*.*" user!=cmon_user user!=int*_* user!=admin index=_internal method=GET sourcetype=splunk_web_access status=200 uri_path="/*/app/*" (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*)) | rename user as User | timechart count as "Pageviews" by "User"

index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=idm*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*) (user!="splunk-system-user" AND user!=admin AND user!=cmon_user AND user!=int*_*) action=success OR action="*login*" | table _time, user | head 10 | sort - _time
index=_audit (create_user info=succeeded) OR (action=create_user info=succeeded) |timechart count by username

(search_id!="rsa_*" action=search host=* index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail NOT user=cmon_user NOT user=internal_monitoring NOT user=ops_admin (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*) (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*)) | eval user=if((user == "n/a"),null(),user), search_type=case(match(search_id,"^SummaryDirector_"),"summarization",match(savedsearch_name,"^_ACCELERATE_"),"acceleration",match(search_id,"^((rt_)?scheduler_|alertsmanager_)"),"scheduled",match(search_id,"\\d{10}\\.\\d+(_[0-9A-F]{8}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{12})?$"),"ad hoc",true(),"other"), search=if((isnull(savedsearch_name) OR (savedsearch_name == "")),search,savedsearch_name) | stats min(_time) as _time, values(user) as user, values(_time) as time, values(info) as info, max(total_run_time) as total_run_time, first(search) as search, first(search_type) as search_type, first(apiStartTime) as apiStartTime, first(apiEndTime) as apiEndTime by search_id, host | search (host=* (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*)) | where ((search_type == "ad hoc") AND isnotnull(search)) | mvexpand info | search (info=completed OR info=failed) | bin span=10m _time | fields + _time, user | fillnull value=N/A _time | search _time!=N/A | chart count over _time by user useother=false

(search_id!="rsa_*" action=search host=* index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail NOT user=cmon_user NOT user=internal_monitoring NOT user=ops_admin (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*) (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*)) | eval user=if((user == "n/a"),null(),user), search_type=case(match(search_id,"^SummaryDirector_"),"summarization",match(savedsearch_name,"^_ACCELERATE_"),"acceleration",match(search_id,"^((rt_)?scheduler_|alertsmanager_)"),"scheduled",match(search_id,"\\d{10}\\.\\d+(_[0-9A-F]{8}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{12})?$"),"ad hoc",true(),"other"), search=if((isnull(savedsearch_name) OR (savedsearch_name == "")),search,savedsearch_name) | stats min(_time) as _time, values(user) as user, values(_time) as time, values(info) as info, max(total_run_time) as total_run_time, first(search) as search, first(search_type) as search_type, first(apiStartTime) as apiStartTime, first(apiEndTime) as apiEndTime by search_id, host | search (host=* (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*)) | where ((search_type == "ad hoc") AND isnotnull(search)) | stats dc(user) as count_user, dc(host) as count_host, median(total_run_time) as median_runtime, sum(total_run_time) as cum_runtime, count(search) as count, max(_time) as last_use by user | eval median_runtime=if(isnotnull(median_runtime),median_runtime,"-"), cum_runtime=if(isnotnull(cum_runtime),cum_runtime,"-"), last_use=strftime(last_use,"%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S %z") | fields + user, count, median_runtime, search_type, cum_runtime, last_use | sort - count | rename count as "Search Count", count_host as "Search Head Count", count_user as "User Count", cum_runtime as "Cumulative Runtime", host as Host, last_use as "Last Search", median_runtime as "Median Runtime", user as User
